SalesOrderItem.description: The SalesOrderItems array cannot be null and cannot be an empty array.

Sku.description:
Maps to the field Products.ProductId in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Empty strings: not allowed

Quantity.description:
Maps to the field SalesOrderItems.Quantity in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Zero values: not allowed

Price.description:
The price paid per item for the specified Sku, before discounts, excluding tax.
Null values: not allowed
Zero values: allowed
